definitions.body: capital of N. Isr. from Omri’s time (belonging to clan [[שֶׁמֶר]], Sta:ZAW v (1885), 165–175; originally [[שַׁמְרוֹם]] or [[שַׁמְרַיִן]]; As. Samerina COT:1Ki 16:24);—´[[שׁ]]: 1Ki 16:24 (name expl. as from [[שֶׁמֶר]], orig. owner of site), v:1Ki 16:28, v:1Ki 16:29, v:1Ki 16:32, 1Ki 20:1, 1Ki 20:10 +; [[שׁׂמְר֫וֹנָה]] 1Ki 20:43, 2Ki 6:19, 2Ki 14:14; personified as woman Ez Eze 16:46, Eze 16:51, Eze 16:53, Eze 16:55, Eze 23:4, Eze 23:33; king of N. Israel is ´[[מֶלֶח שׁ]]: 1Ki 21:1, 2Ki 1:3; ´[[אֲשֶׁר בְּשׁ]]: 1Ki 21:18, cf. ´[[בְּשׁ]] :´[[מָלַח עַל־יִשׂ]]: 1Ki 22:52 + 9 t.; thence name of territory, ´[[שְׂדֵה שׁ]]: Ob:Ob 19, ´[[עָרֵי שׁ]]: 1Ki 13:32 (point of view of later editor), 2Ki 17:24, 2Ki 17:26, 2Ki 23:19; ´[[הָרֵי שׁ]]: Am 3:9, Je 31:5,—cf. ´[[הַו־שׁ]]: Am 4:1, Am 6:1, 1Ki 16:24; perh. ´[[שׁ]]: alone Je 23:13, 1Ki 18:2, 2Ki 7:24, 2Ki 7:28, 2Ch 25:13; ´[[חֵיל שׁ]]: Ne 3:34.—LXX usu. Samareia, but 1Ki 16:24 Semerw, Saemerwn, Somorwn; = mod. Sebastieh; vid. GASm: G 346 ff. Buhl:G 207 f. Cowley:Ency. Bib. s. v. Wilson:Hast. DB s.v..
